nodes.text: First raid on the Sith Citadel

In 5000 BBY, Sith Lord Naga Sadow launched a raid on the Sith Citadel on Ziost, in an attempt to free prisoners Gav and Jori Daragon. Disguising the assault to appear as a Galactic Republic operation, Sadow freed the Daragons, killing venerable Sith Lord Simus in the process.
